Helper utilities for running nimble tasks

Imports

hshell, oswrap, htemplates

proc runDockerTest(projDir, tmpDir, cmd: string;
                  runCb: proc () = (proc () = discard )): void {...}{.raises: [OSError, IOError,
    OSError, ValueError, AssertionError, Exception, Defect, ShellError], tags: [
    WriteDirEffect, ReadDirEffect, WriteIOEffect, ReadIOEffect, ShellExecEffect,
    ExecIOEffect, ReadEnvEffect, RootEffect].}
Copy project directory projDir into temporary tmpDir and execute command cmd inside new docker container based on nim-base image.
